summary: This is an email exchange between FBI personnel regarding the analysis of financial records from UBS related to the Montpelier Trust. It details the trust's funding sources, trustees, and account information, revealing Ghislaine Maxwell's direct financial involvement.

persons.name: Mark M. Lubin
persons.context: FBI forensic accountant in New York who prepared and sent the analysis of the Montpelier Trust Account records from UBS.

persons.name: Alison
persons.context: FBI recipient of the financial analysis who requests follow-up information about the source accounts funding the Montpelier Trust.

persons.name: Amanda N. Young
persons.context: FBI personnel copied on the email correspondence regarding the trust account analysis.

persons.name: Jeffery Roberts
persons.context: One of the trustees of the Montpelier Trust, with a signature date of 12/12/18, associated with the law firm Nutter McClennen & Fish.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: One of the trustees of the Montpelier Trust, with a signature date of 12/2/18, listed as a contact for shareholder communications.

persons.name: Christine Yvonne Malina-Maxwell
persons.context: One of the trustees of the Montpelier Trust, with a signature date of 12/12/18.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The grantor who funded the Montpelier Trust Account with $785,339 from her personal account.

connections.description: Colleagues within the FBI communicating about financial analysis of the Montpelier Trust.
Maxwell is the grantor of a trust for which Roberts serves as a trustee.
Maxwell is the grantor of a trust for which Borgerson serves as a trustee.
Maxwell is the grantor of a trust for which Malina-Maxwell serves as a trustee.

events.title: Montpelier Trust Established
events.description: The Montpelier Trust, an irrevocable trust, was established.

events.title: Trustees Sign for Trust Account
events.description: Trustees Jeffery Roberts and Christine Yvonne Malina-Maxwell signed the UBS trust signature page on 12/12/18; Scott Borgerson signed on 12/2/18.

events.title: FBI Analysis of Trust Funds
events.description: FBI forensic accountant Mark Lubin provides an analysis of the Montpelier Trust Account funding and requests further information on source accounts.

locations: 155 Seaport Boulevard, ATTN: Nutter McClennen & Fish LLP, Boston, MA 02210-2698
keyFacts: The Montpelier Trust Account was funded from three sources: the Montpelier Trust Account itself ($2,750,000), a Ghislaine Maxwell account ($785,339), and an unknown account ($917,419).
Ghislaine Maxwell is explicitly identified as the grantor of the Montpelier Trust.
The trustees of the trust are Jeffery Roberts, Scott Borgerson, and Christine Yvonne Malina-Maxwell, with the trust's address of record at a Boston law firm.
The FBI was actively analyzing this financial structure in July 2020 as part of its investigation.
The document indicates the trust was established as irrevocable on July 31, 2018.
